name: RPBroadcastConfiguration
desc: An object used to configure the movie clips produced during a live broadcast.

items.name: var clipDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration of movie clips sent the to the movie clip handler extension.

items.name: var videoCompressionProperties: [String : NSSecureCoding & NSObjectProtocol]?
items.desc: The compression properties for encoding movie clips that are to be overwritten.
